chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 mini has the above problem:
I received the iPhone today, and it seems that the flash is stuck and the phone flickers when recognizing words. I would like to request a replacement device in excellent condition, as ordered.

Thank you very much for your help,

Hello Annegret, You can find your return label attached to this message. Your return will be handled by Chronopost. Just drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find a list of locations here: Before you prepare your return, please follow these steps: 1. Find instructions on how to return an item 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product 3. Remove any existing protective wrapping or film 4. Wrap your product and its accessories according to the tips below. How to wrap your product: • The box should be strong and sturdy, with your product nestled in a way that prevents it from moving during transport. • Stick the return label on top of the box (you can also attach an extra label inside for identification purposes if the original label is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before sending it off. This protects you in case your product is damaged during transit. Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll notify you as soon as it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Dear ecomobile

the customer has contacted us and told us that the flash seems to be stuck and the phone flickers when recognizing words. the customer would like a replacement unit in excellent condition as ordered.

Thank you for your help, have a nice day.

Regards,
Reyhan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Kindly ask the customer to provide pictures of the device for us to better assess the situation and assist the customer.

Regards,
SY
